question: What should I do if I think my eligibility results are wrong?
text:
What should I do if I think my eligibility results are wrong?
          
        
(Desplazarse hacia abajo para ver Preguntas Ms Frecuentes en Espaol)
If you believe your eligibility determination is incorrect, first review the information that you submitted on your applicationtoensure that it is accurate. To do so,navigate to yourmember dashboard and clickView Application.If younoticeanythingthatneeds to be updated, clickEdit Application, make the appropriate changes,and re-submityour application.

Ifyou've confirmed that the information inyour application is accurate and you stillbelieveyoureligibility results areincorrect, youcansubmit anappeal. The following types of decisionsare generally eligible forappeal throughPennie:



Your eligibility to buy health coverage through Pennie.


The Advanced Premium Tax Credits (including the dollar amount of your tax credit) you are eligible to receive


The Cost Sharing Reductions (including the dollar amount of your Cost Sharing Reductions) you are eligible to receive


Your ability to enroll in or change plans through Pennie outside of an open enrollment period


Your ability to enroll in coverage through Pennie because Pennie told you that you failed to submit documents proving you were ineligible for other types of health coverage


Pennie did not provide you with a timely eligibility determination after you applied for insurance coverage


_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Si cree que su determinacin de elegibilidad es incorrecta, primero revise la informacin que ha presentado en su solicitud para garantizar que es correcta. Para hacerlo,vaya a su panel de miembro y haga clic en View Application (Ver solicitud).Si nota algo que debe ser actualizado, haga clic en Edit Application (Editar solicitud) para realizar los cambios apropiados y volver a enviar su solicitud.

Si ha confirmado que la informacin en su solicitud es correcta y usted todava considera que sus resultados de elegibilidad son incorrectos, puede presentar una apelacin. Los siguientes tipos de decisiones en general son elegibles para apelacin a travs de Pennie:



Su elegibilidad para adquirir una cobertura mdica a travs de Pennie.


El Crdito Fiscal Adelantado para la Prima (incluido el monto de su Crdito Fiscal) que usted califica para recibir


La Reduccin de Costos Compartidos (incluido el monto de sus Reducciones de Costos Compartidos) que usted califica para recibir


Su capacidad para inscribirse o cambiar de plan a travs de Pennie fuera de un perodo de inscripcin abierta


Su capacidad para inscribirse en cobertura a travs de Pennie, porque Pennie le inform que no present los documentos que prueban que no califica para otros tipos de cobertura mdica


Pennie no le brind una decisin a tiempo despus de haber solicitado cobertura de seguro
